about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'The Sexy Workaholic Wife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

The Sexy Workaholic Wife

HEROINE:
Harukaze Azaki
A sexy career woman with bouncy tits.

SYNOPSIS (The Sexy Workaholic Wife)


She's a difficult person and doesn't feel at all confident because her husband doesn't look at her as a woman anymore.
As a result, she just dedicates herself to work these days.
She loves her husband and understands her own stubbornness, but she just can't bring herself to behave like a cute woman.
So, she just devotes herself to working very hard.
She's especially critical of her young co-workers and is always hostile to them, as they remind her of her husband.
She's recently been placed in charge of training a young male worker and she really lets him have it.
But...he's smarter than she thinks and realizes why she's always so harsh to him. He then goes on a mission to score with her.
He asks her to hang out after work and listens to her bitch as they drink some alcohol.
Initially, she's leery of him but, after his irresistible seduction, ends up having sex with him at a hotel.
Her insatiable body can't contain itself as she just cums with pleasure.
Then, she becomes completely obedient to him, but on the other hand, continues putting up a front at work.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.
